pages.text: $(li)The Patrol is a rare, naturally-spawning group of $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l) over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Their leader, who is identified by carrying the Illagers flag, may drop their flag and very rarely a Raid Horn on death.$(br)$(li)You can force a Patrol to spawn using the $(l:patchouli:tools/charm/raid_horn)Raid Horn$(/l) too.
